thread.title: Pentaho to Live Webcast 2015 PentahoWorld Keynotes
thread.title_full: Pentaho to Live Webcast 2015 PentahoWorld Keynotes

title: Pentaho to Live Webcast 2015 PentahoWorld Keynotes
text:
Learning & Support Pentaho to Live Webcast 2015 PentahoWorld Keynotes Executive Presentations From Caterpillar, Cloudera, FINRA, Forrester, HDS, and Pentaho Will Address the Power of Big Data at Work October 09, 2015 11:21 ET | Source: Pentaho, a Hitachi Data Systems company SAN FRANCISCO, Oct. 09, 2015 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Delivering the future of analytics , Pentaho, a Hitachi Data Systems company, today announced a live webcast of the PentahoWorld 2015 keynotes will be streamed on Wednesday, October 14, 2015 starting at 5:00 a.m. Pacific Time / 8:00 a.m. Eastern Time and Thursday, October 15 at 12:30 p.m. Pacific Time / 3:30 p.m. Eastern Time from Orlando, Florida. 
To watch live, please join siliconANGLE TV: http://live.siliconangle.tv/ and participate in the online conversation using #PWorld15. Following is the keynote line-up: 
Wednesday, October 14 at 5:00 a.m. Pacific Time / 8:00 a.m. Eastern Time Quentin Gallivan, Chief Executive Officer, Pentaho, a Hitachi Data Systems company Christopher Dziekan, Chief Product Officer, Pentaho, a Hitachi Data Systems company Saman Michael Far, Senior Vice President of Technology, FINRA Mike Gualtieri, Principal Analyst, Forrester Mike Olson, Chief Strategy Officer, Cloudera Kevin Eggleston, Senior Vice President of Social Innovation, HDS 
Thursday, October 15 at 12:30 p.m. Pacific Time / 3:30 p.m. Eastern Time Quentin Gallivan, Chief Executive Officer, Pentaho, a Hitachi Data Systems company James Stascavage, Head of Engineering, Caterpillar Marine Asset Intelligence Pentaho Excellence Award Winners Ceremony with Black Arrow, CERN, FINRA, Mo’Mix Solutions and Tidal 
Additionally, tune in to theCUBE to watch live Q&A interviews from Pentaho users, experts, advocates, and partners: http://siliconangle.tv/pentaho-world-2015/ . 
About Pentaho, a Hitachi Data Systems company Pentaho, a Hitachi Data Systems company, is a leading data integration and business analytics company with an enterprise-class, open source-based platform for diverse big data deployments. Pentaho’s unified data integration and analytics platform is comprehensive, completely embeddable and delivers governed data to power any analytics in any environment. Pentaho’s mission is to help organizations across multiple industries harness the value from all their data, including big data and IoT, enabling them to find new revenue streams, operate more efficiently, deliver outstanding service and minimize risk. Pentaho has over 15,000 product deployments and 1,500 commercial customers today including ABN-AMRO Clearing, EMC, Landmark Halliburton, Moody’s, NASDAQ, RichRelevance, and Staples. To learn more about Pentaho visit http://www.pentaho.com . Pentaho Media Contact US & Worldwide Rebecca Shomair Director of Corporate Communications communications@pentaho.com +1 646-484-8150 Related Articles other press releases by Pentaho, a Hitachi Data Systems company
